## PlayerCamera.setViewModelHiddenNodes() method

Hides nodes on the view model (or attached entity's model if no view model is set).

**Signature:**

```typescript
setViewModelHiddenNodes(viewModelHiddenNodes: string[]): void;
```

## Remarks

Only affects this camera's player. Uses case-insensitive substring matching. Replaces the current set (not a merge).
